screen_desc: The screenshot shows the home screen of an Android smartphone with a dark background. There are four app icons at the top: Email, Photos, and YouTube. Below these, there are four more app icons for Phone, Messages, Chrome, and Play Store. The status bar at the top displays the date and battery level. At the bottom, there is a Google search bar and app icons for other functions.
action_think: To show the shopping cart on Target, I need to open the Target app. The app is likely to be in the app drawer which is accessible from the app icon at the bottom right corner of the screen.
action_plan: Find and open the Target app
action_desc: Tap the app drawer icon at the bottom right
action_result: By clicking on the chrome app, we have moved from the home screen to the Google search bar. This allows us to enter the target shopping cart page. This action is necessary to demonstrate how to get to the target shopping cart. Therefore, this action has made progress towards the user request.
